content: indicate mc blue or cc nothing row each square except for the first and last two red row represents two row of knitting and any colored squares below a chart are there to indicate the stitch count each block of color represents 10 stitches charts should be read from right to left just like you are looking at your knitting with the piece on your left hand needle final note the first two row of red in the chart represent your cast on and first two row of knit not 4 row and the last two row of red represent the last three row of knit and cast off again not 4 row there will be two ridges of main color on top and bottom when you are done dishcloth coaster table mat copyright 2014 rebekah yeager all rights reserved reproducing or transmitting this page or any pages of this pattern by any means and for any purpose other than personal use constitutes a violation of copyright law
